body:
PortingPolicy says

> A first class port has these properties:
> - Broken builds block releases
> - Official binaries are provided
> - Installation is documented at http://golang.org/doc/install

Those are supposed to be all true or all not, for each port. More specifically, I believe the list on /doc/install under supported systems is the master list of first-class ports. I have certainly edited that list in the past with that in mind.

We have in the past agreed to put up binaries for other ports, but we should do a better job of clarifying them on the download page as not officially supported.
